name: Stick Wars - Demo
description:
A game about stick people fighting. It is meant to be a serious story with some funny moments.

Kain leads his unit through tough terrain while uncovering the truth about his leader.

Lynn chases Kain as he turns against the people he serves.

A story begins in the first entry in the trilogy of Stick Wars.

I am no great writer and I can't do any artwork. So I decided to make a game about stick people, but with the same basic ideas for plot and gameplay. Let me know any problems you have and I will work to fix them!

https://www.patreon.com/edit/about -Patreon has the full game in the early access
